title: Coop TMS
description: Terminal Management System for digital products such as ATM, POS and other related products. The project has simplified work and reduced errors by 95%.

title: Coop File Sharing
description: Coop file sharing is a system designed to share files such as memo, guidelines, important informations to employees of coopbank enhancing collaborations.

title: Freelancing Website
description: Freelance website named Ethiofreelance was built for the purpose of linking freelancers with employers. This project is my Final Capstone project I have worked on for my Bsc. degree.
